attributes.action: Stop DHSS Department Manipulating their figures
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The DHSS should be forcibly if need be stopped from forcing people sharing a home (not as a couple) from claiming as individuals, instead of as presently they force single people co-habiting into joint claims with the Tax office

Currently they are causing complications and many UK households are being ordered by a Government to repay funds due to mistakes caused by the DHSS, in order to reduce number claiming benefits
